Arthur Burton.description: conversing about Arthur Burton seeking Carmen Ortiz's recommendations for unique and seasonal ingredients to create a new cocktail, with Carmen suggesting locally sourced honey, dried lavender, specialty bitters, and fresh citrus fruits, along with tips on balancing flavors. @ <persona> Carmen Ortiz
chat: Carmen Ortiz
Hi Arthur! How are you today? I see you're shopping for bar supplies—anything specific I can help you find?
Arthur Burton

Hi Carmen! I'm doing well, thanks. Just picking up some fresh ingredients for a new seasonal cocktail I'm working on. Do you have any recommendations for unique or seasonal items that might inspire something special?
Carmen Ortiz

That sounds exciting, Arthur! We just got in some locally sourced honey and a batch of dried lavender—they could add a lovely, unique twist to your cocktail. I also have some fresh citrus fruits and a few specialty bitters that might spark some inspiration. Would you like to take a look at those?
Arthur Burton

That sounds perfect, Carmen! I'd love to take a look at the honey, dried lavender, and the specialty bitters. I think those could really elevate the drink. Do you have any tips on how to balance the flavors with those ingredients?
Carmen Ortiz

Absolutely, Arthur! When using honey, I recommend starting with a small amount and adjusting to taste, as it can be quite sweet. The dried lavender pairs beautifully with citrus—try infusing it in simple syrup for a subtle floral note. As for the bitters, a few drops can add depth without overpowering the drink. Let me grab those items for you, and we can discuss further!
Arthur Burton

Thanks so much, Carmen! That’s incredibly helpful. I’ll definitely give those tips a try. I’m excited to see how the honey and lavender work together—I think it could be a hit at the pub. Let me grab those items and maybe a few extra citrus fruits too, just in case. You’ve been a huge help!
Carmen Ortiz
You're very welcome, Arthur! I'm glad I could help. If you need any more advice or ingredients, don't hesitate to ask. Good luck with your new cocktail—I can't wait to hear how it turns out!
